arts.ttl: Arsenal goalkeeper David Raya gives bizarre explanation for conceding Dominik Szoboszlai's WONDER free-kick in defeat by Liverpool
arts.sum: David Raya has given a bizarre explanation for conceding Dominik Szoboszlai's free-kick in Arsenal's 1-0 defeat to Liverpool.

arts.ttl: Mikel Merino applauds Arsenal performance in ‚Äòdifficult circumstances‚Äô at Anfield
arts.sum: I think the team showed courage and character throughout the game, but in a set piece, in a magic moment, they scored, and they got the three points.‚Äù More injuries have struck down the squad on the road, and despite the defeat, the Spaniard saw a lot of positives from the players "in difficult circumstances."

arts.ttl: Liverpool 1-0 Arsenal: Liverpool get one over Arsenal after Szoboszlai delivers stunning free-kick
arts.sum: It flew towards David Raya ‚Äôs goal, taking a nick of the inside of the right post and left the Arsenal goalkeeper clutching at thin air. Slot has seen his team struggle at times during the opening weeks of the season and required some late interventions to ensure three matches have brought three victories.

arts.ttl: Forget Mosquera and Madueke, Rio Ferdinand says Arsenal star who made five clearances was ‚Äòbrilliant‚Äô vs Liverpool
A stunning free-kick goal by Liverpool FC midfielder Dominik Szoboszlai beats Arsenal
arts.sum: During his post-match press conference, Liverpool FC head coach Arne Slot praised Dominik Szoboszlai by saying that the Hungarian understands what a Reds player should look like: "if you wear this shirt you should give everything, no matter in what position you play." Liverpool FC perfect regular season continues, as the Reds beat powerhouse Arsenal - currently on third place - 1-0 with a spectacular free-kick goal.

Stunning Szoboszlai goal sees Liverpool beat Arsenal
arts.sum: Watch Premier League highlights as Liverpool beat Arsenal at Anfield courtesy of a brilliant Dominik Szoboszlai free-kick.

arts.ttl: Viktor Gyokeres will surely blame Mikel Arteta for terrible statistic that emerged against Liverpool
Arsenal slammed for 'ugly brand of football' as Man Utd icon makes unusual Liverpool claim
arts.sum: Arsenal were beaten at Liverpool on Sunday and Peter Schmeichel has called out their over reliance on set pieces as he took aim at their negative brand of football
